vision: create a mobile app called SuperSpouse, that allow couples to help and support each other in running a household or a family. System should allow a family member to basically start a family and invite family members to join, this will limit the visibility to who can access the family information. App should support offline use. App should make it easy to either log or request assistance with common household chores. Create an initial list of common household chores
scope: Create requirements for becoming a member, creating a family, adding members, logging or requesting chores and assigning, allow for the management of their own custom chore list

requirements.text: User must register an account with email and password to become a member.
requirements.benefit: Ensures privacy and secure access to family data.
requirements.value: Protects family data from unauthorized access.
requirements.useCase: User registers to use the app.

requirements.text: User can create a family, setting a family name, and invite members via email.
requirements.benefit: Reduces the time to setup a family group by 50%.

requirements.text: Family members can be added or removed by the family creator or admin.
requirements.benefit: Allows for dynamic family changes without app intervention.
requirements.value: Adapts to changes in family structure.

requirements.text: Users can log chores with details like Chore Name, Description, and Due Date.
Users can request assistance for chores, specifying the chore and time frame.
requirements.benefit: Increases the likelihood of chore completion by 30%.

requirements.text: Family members can assign chores to one another, with an option for acceptance.
requirements.benefit: Reduces time spent on chore negotiation by 40%.

requirements.text: App supports offline use, syncing data when online.
requirements.benefit: Maintains app usability in areas with poor connectivity.
requirements.useCase: Using the app in offline mode.

requirements.text: Users can manage their own custom chore list, adding, editing, or deleting chores.
requirements.benefit: Allows for personalization, potentially increasing user satisfaction by 25%.
requirements.value: Caters to individual needs within the family.

requirements.text: Visibility of family information is limited to invited members.
requirements.benefit: Protects family privacy and reduces information overload.

questions.text: What are the criteria for allowing or denying family membership?
How should the app handle the removal of a family member?
options: Remove all data associated with the member
Keep member data for future reference
Allow member to export their data before removal

questions.text: What kind of offline data handling is required for the app?
What security measures are necessary for offline data?
options: User authentication required for data access
